summary: End Session 1 closeout: finalize session_001 record, quick reference, world state rumors, campaign_state end markers, and freeze the session log (non-LATEST copy).

changes.change: Replace placeholder session_001.json with actual Session 1 data (Elitrof; Talos sting; Chillfurrow wolves; Pelagia giant; Dragonsreach hearing hook).
Refresh quick reference to current Act I/Whiterun state, active clocks, Elitrof end-of-session condition, and next session hook.
Prepend two rumors about Pelagia giant and Talos-Justiciar incident; add an active threat about Thalmor witness pressure; append a major event about the Pelagia giant.
Add last_session_ended_at, last_session_title, and next_scene_hint markers for Session 1 closure.
Create frozen copy of the LATEST session log as an immutable session record.
